kateacuff.comment: My initial instinct was to say yes—we've had good success with virtual learning. But looking at student outcomes data, some kids still struggle when they're remote. And many teachers don't like teaching online. So I'd rather keep our focus on reopening safely.

grahampaige.comment: OK, thank you very much. All right, so we had three votes. And Dr. Albright, could you tell me how many people voted for each item?
